chart.title: Share of artificial intelligence jobs among all job postings
chart.subtitle: A job posting is considered an AI job if it requests one or more AI skills, e.g., "natural language processing", "neural networks", "machine learning", or "robotics".

Share of artificial intelligence jobs am.titleShort: Share of artificial intelligence jobs among all job postings
Share of artificial intelligence jobs am.titleLong: Share of artificial intelligence jobs among all job postings
Share of artificial intelligence jobs am.descriptionShort: A job posting is considered an AI job if it requests one or more AI skills, e.g., "natural language processing", "neural networks", "machine learning", or "robotics".
descriptionKey: Lightcast classifies a job as an AI job if it mentions at least one AI-related skill in the posting text.

AI-related skills are grouped into categories like machine learning and neural networks, natural language processing, generative AI, robotics and autonomous systems, computer vision, and AI ethics and governance.
This method helps track employer demand for AI skills over time using real-time job posting data.
Share of artificial intelligence jobs am.citationShort: Lightcast via AI Index Report (2025) – with minor processing by Our World in Data
Share of artificial intelligence jobs am.citationLong: Lightcast via AI Index Report (2025) – with minor processing by Our World in Data. “Share of artificial intelligence jobs among all job postings” [dataset]. Lightcast via AI Index Report, “AI Index Report” [original data].
